Fabienne Lena Weber is a 38 year old Fleet Manager from Switzerland.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.

Occupation History:
Fabienne Lena Weber is a seasoned professional with over 15 years of experience.
In 2010, Fabienne Lena Weber started working as a Ship Broker at Hapag-Lloyd (Switzerland) AG, marking the beginning of her successful career.
She then transitioned to CMA CGM (Switzerland) SA as a Shipping Company Owner, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 2014 to 2018.
Her tenure as a Fleet Manager at Mediterranean Shipping Company (MSC) SA from 2018 to 2024 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
